page.title: 03BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {The Rev.D.Martin}was ordained 14 years ago. He started as the curate of Sedgely , then became Rector of All Saints, Worcester before coming to { {St.Mary's Church, Madresfield.}He performs about 40-50 weddings per year, and holds 10-11 funerals per year. He enjoys his work. There has been a church in Madresfield since before 1852. The first church ( a Norman building ) was dismantled in 1852, and a new church erected on the same site, which is now marked by a stone cross. This church only survived 12 years, due to faulty foundations. The present church was erected on a new site using materials from the second church. It was consecrated in 1867. By Thomas Walker and Michael Parsons.
